titles.title: God Will Take Care of You (Civilla D. Martin)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Be not dismayed whate’er betide, God will take care of you; Beneath His wings of love abide, God will take care of you.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}God will take care of you. Thro’ every day, o’er all the way, He will take care of you; God will take care of you.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
v4
v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}No matter what may be the test, God will take care of you; Lean, weary one, upon His breast, God will take care of you.{/lang-eng}
